info.name: YouTube Vibra
info.description:
It's a vibrant userstyle for YouTube.com it revamps, refreshes and redesigns your YouTube experience.
YouTube Vibra is luminous and vivacious, it is filled with reorientation to the monotone Vanilla YouTube without losing its familiarity. If you're looking for a vivid replacement to the sombre YouTube, this userstyle is for you.
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.1 -Changed the Youtube logo in the footer -Changed the color of text in many places -Changed the color of the dropdown menu -Changed the color of the new upload button -And some more bits Version 1 -Changed all the fonts to web-safe fonts so that everyone with modern browsers can use this theme -Fixed a lot of buttons -Changed a lot of colors of links from blue to salmon -Change the design of the footer Beta 2 -Changed the design of SocialBlade as well as many other YouTube plugins such as Youtube Plus and SaveFrom -Changed the design of the Pop-up -Centralized the text in the search bar -Fixed some issues with the guide -Changed many icons Beta 1 -Changed the design of the masthead -Changed the design of multiple buttons -Changed the body font from Roboto to Lato -Changed the font color of a variety of items -Changed the color of the Search Bar -Changed the color of the progress bar -And much more Credits Search icon taken from Enes Dal
